document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Zun Villa at the end of Tarsar's Street.
document_data.name: Zun Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Zun Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Zun]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the east section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. It sat on the eastern end of [[Tarsar's Street]] on [[Saerdoun Street]]. The villa also touched the [[Cliffwatch]] just south of [[Endcliff Tower]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The walled compound contained two buildings located adjacent to each other. The buildings were two and four storys tall.
